name: Chief Operations Officer
description: Template for COOs focusing on operational excellence, cross-functional coordination, efficiency, and execution.

capturePrompts.label: Operational Status
capturePrompts.prompt: What is the current operational state?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., On track, Bottleneck identified, Scaling challenge

capturePrompts.label: Key Metrics
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Throughput up 15%, SLA at 99.2%, Cost per unit

capturePrompts.label: Decisions Needed
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Approve vendor, Prioritize initiative, Resource allocation

capturePrompts.label: Execution Risks
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Resource constraint, Dependencies, Timeline pressure

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Chief Operations Officer. Focus on operational excellence, cross-functional coordination, and execution effectiveness. Identify bottlenecks, resource constraints, and process improvements. Suggest delegation opportunities and escalation points. Prioritize measurable outcomes.
